reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Evelyn is the only air healer in the game, and her healing is the best among all healers. This makes her the first pick for various game modes because air units are safer in the sky and don't die as easily as ground units. Despite being a healer, her damage is actually pretty good, especially if you give her ASPD set which works great with her skillset. Still, CDR is the BiS set on her, because you want to boost her healing, not damage. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVP, she recently reached the fabled ban level 4 in the KR region and is commonly used even on ban levels 1 and 2. Fully geared with 72% Skill Haste gear, her healing output is ridiculous. One of the reasons why she's so popular in PVP is that she can't be countered by Awaken Na Yubin who loves to fight against Yang Harim and her barriers - this makes Evelyn a safe pick when it comes to the healer spot.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- best healing output in the game,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- safer in the sky as an air employee,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- has very respectable amounts of damage despite being a healer","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

cons.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- anti-air employees make her hard to play during some weeks in PVP,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- she's quite squishy.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

description.description: Continuously heals surrounding allies from the air.

introduction.introduction:
Witch Evelyn is a healing supporter who flies around on her broom, recovering allies and causing constant damage on enemies with her potions.

　She is the barista, pastry chef, and accountant at Witch Cafe Strega. Because she knows how to touch people's hearts, she has single-handedly acquired many regular customers to the cafe.
　But Laura doesn't trust her to take care of the cafe on her own, because Evelyn often mixes her experimental potions into customers' drinks for clinical experiments. The cafe regularly receives complaints about employees adding weird substances to the coffee.
　But it hasn't cause too much problems since most of the reviews are favorable, whether it be a love coming true or recovering health after visiting the cafe.

pve.notes: EE can be worse than normal gear in some situations.

pvp.notes: EE can be worse than normal gear in some situations.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Throws a potion bottle from the air, inflicting AoE damage on and around the target.
Sprays suspicious chemicals that have miraculous benefits. After every 3rd Basic attack, she restores surrounding units' HP by 2% upon the next Basic attack.
Throws a healing potion, inflicting AoE damage on enemies in front. Allies within the potion's explosion range recover 25% of HP over 8 seconds.
Uses the best potion formula she has, restoring HP of all allies except herself by 30% and inflicting AoE damage on enemies.

level5.level5: ATK of all allies except herself +15% for 15 s after skill
